virtual int get_marker_index (void *=0) const

virtual sxsdk::texture_interface& sxsdk::proxy_shape_class::texture ( int  thread = 0,
void *  aux = 0 
) [virtual]

returns a reference to texture_interface.

if texture_interface does not exist, a new one is created. if texture_interface exists, returns a reference to it.
